alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Jones; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:01PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Baldwin, central Wilkinson, southeastern Bibb, central Twiggs, southern Hancock, west central Washington and southeastern Jones Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 401 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Underwood to near Coopers to near Huber, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, pea sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Milledgeville, Jeffersonville, Irwinton, Gordon, Ivey, McIntyre, Midway-Hardwick, Marion, Beulah, Allenwood, Mountain Springs, Griswoldville, Hardwick, Devereux, Coopers, Underwood, Linton, Fitzpatrick, Pancras, and Scottsboro. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central and east central Georgia.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin; Bibb; Hancock; Jones; Twiggs; Washington; Wilkinson
